style: <style>::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px;}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:#eee;border-radius:10px;}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{border-radius:10px;border:2px solid #eee;background:repeating-linear-gradient(45deg,#ff6b6b,#ff6b6b 15px,#feca57 15px,#feca57 30px,#48dbfb 30px,#48dbfb 45px);background-size:130px 130px;background-position:0px var(--scroll-offset,0px);}pre::-webkit-scrollbar,code::-webkit-scrollbar,.markdown-body .highlight pre::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px;height:10px;}pre::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,code::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background-color:#ccc;border-radius:10px;}pre::-webkit-scrollbar-track,code::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:transparent;}#postBody p:has(> a > img),#postBody p:has(> img){display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(min(150px,100%),1fr));gap:10px;margin:1.5rem 0;align-items:start;}#postBody p:has(img) br{display:none;}#postBody p:has(img) a:only-of-type,#postBody p:has(img) img:only-of-type{grid-column:1 / -1;}#postBody p img{width:100% !important;aspect-ratio:1 / 1;object-fit:cover;border-radius:8px;display:block;background-color:#f0f0f0;}#postBody p:has(img) a:only-of-type img,#postBody p:has(img) img:only-of-type{aspect-ratio:auto;max-height:550px;width:auto !important;max-width:100%;}</style>
